column1: arbitrator under section 4(1) of the Industrial Disputes Act No. 43 of 1950 (as amended).4 The
statement of the matter in dispute provided as follows;

column2: entitled  for  holiday  payments,  salary  increases,  annual  salary  increments,  overtime
relevant  to  post  and  promotions as  per  Regulations  of  the  RDB  Bank  established  in
accordance with the Regional Development Bank Act, No. 1985 and whether he has
been caused injustice by not receiving them, and, if so, to what relief he is entitled.5
